text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm and today a very interesting

feta onions and parmesan it is really
interesting really delicious and pumpkin
seeds are about the most healthy thing
you can okay
especially the raw ones so check this
out very easy to put together i'm gonna
take an onion one whole onion 1 large
onions slice it up and saute it in a
couple tablespoons of olive oil just on
medium heat now we don't want this real
brown but we do want to soften sweet
we're gonna cook that for about 10
minutes halfway through I'm going to
throw in about a teaspoon of chopped
rosemary fresh rosemary and a big pinch
of salt and we're just gonna let that
sweat for about another five minutes and
it's going to look kind of like that the
edges will start to get brown but not
too dark but the onions will be soft and
sweet and tender and I'm going to turn
off the heat let it cool and then we're
gonna get our pan ready for the crisp
flatbread so what you want to do is just
like pizza you want to put down your
cornmeal on the sheet pan that's gonna
give it that nice crisp bottom and it

pizza dough recipe you can buy it in the

pretty thin I want this to be a nice
thin flatbread The Onion's now are cool
enough to handle I'm gonna plop those on
the dough and very carefully with your
fingers just kind of spread it out you
don't want to punch through the dough to

sauce this is like a really minimalist

all right I'm gonna give it a good grind

I'm gonna crumble a generous supply of

comes from in fact he was a champion
milker dairy farmer in Italy and he had
an extra finger on either hands which
made him just utterly unstoppable when
it came to milking competitions
so a little background there okay so the
oven is preheated to 425 we're going to
put that in the oven for about five
minutes on the bottom of the oven that's
one of the secrets here
we want that flatbread to have a really
nice crisp bottom crust so we're gonna
put it on the bottom of the oven for
about five minutes then we're gonna turn
it rotate it case you got any hot spots
give it another couple minutes then
we're gonna move it up to the middle of
